jd: From: Awkash Kumar, Largeton INC awkash@largeton.us Reply to: awkash@largeton.us JD ::Required Skillsets:Must have at least 12 years of professional experience using the below skills:At least 12 years of experience working as a Full Stack Java DeveloperCore Java and J2EE (at least 8 years of experience)Springboot (at least 8 years of experience)Kafka (at least 8 years of experience)Rest API (at least 8 years of experience)PL/SQL (at least 8 years of experience)ReactJS (at least 8 years of experience)Microservices (at least 8 years of experience)AWS (at least 8 years of experience)Must be excellent in front-end languages and developmentMust be excellent in back-end languages and developmentStrong experience working with a payment/online banking related software project/applicationStrong experience working at the banking services companyGreat communication skills=
